This|||article|||studies|||the|||following|||question:|||"When|||is|||it|||possible|||to|||decide,|||on|||the|||basis|||of|||images|||of|||point|||features|||observed|||by|||an|||imprecisely|||modeled|||two-camera|||stereo TOKEN-Thisarticlestudiesthefollowingquestion:"Whenisitpossibletodecide,onthebasisofimagesofpointfeaturesobservedbyanimpreciselymodeledtwo-camerastereo a T Th Thi This o eo reo ereo thisarticlestudiesthefollowingquestionwhenisitpossibletodecideonthebasisofimagesofpointfeaturesobservedbyanimpreciselymodeledtwocamerastereo InitCap nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-This a T Th Thi This s is his This this InitCap nonNum 0 no no no no no no others none none none none none none none none none none TOKEN-article a a ar art arti e le cle icle article others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-two-camera a t tw two two- a ra era mera twocamera others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-stereo a s st ste ster o eo reo ereo stereo others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others abstract

We|||present|||new|||finite|||difference|||schemes|||for|||the|||incompressible|||Navier-Stokes|||equations.|||The|||schemes|||are|||based|||on|||two|||spatial|||differencing|||methods,|||one|||is|||fourth-order TOKEN-WepresentnewfinitedifferenceschemesfortheincompressibleNavier-Stokesequations.Theschemesarebasedontwospatialdifferencingmethods,oneisfourth-order a W We Wep Wepr r er der rder wepresentnewfinitedifferenceschemesfortheincompressiblenavierstokesequationstheschemesarebasedontwospatialdifferencingmethodsoneisfourthorder InitCap nonNum 0 no no no no no no multiHyphen TOKEN-We a W We We We e We We We we InitCap nonNum 0 no no no no no no others none none none none none none none none none none TOKEN-present a p pr pre pres t nt ent sent present others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-is a i is is is s is is is is others nonNum 16 no no no no placeName no others TOKEN-fourth-order a f fo fou four r er der rder fourthorder others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others abstract
accurate|||and|||the|||other|||is|||sixth-order|||accurate.|||The|||temporal|||differencing|||is|||based|||on TOKEN-accurateandtheotherissixth-orderaccurate.Thetemporaldifferencingisbasedon a a ac acc accu n on don edon accurateandtheotherissixthorderaccuratethetemporaldifferencingisbasedon others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-accurate a a ac acc accu e te ate rate accurate others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others none none none none none none none none none none TOKEN-and a a an and and d nd and and and others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-based a b ba bas base d ed sed ased based others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-on a o on on on n on on on on others nonNum 4 no no lastName no no no others abstract
backward|||differencing|||formulas.|||The|||schemes|||use|||non-staggered|||grids|||and|||satisfy|||regularity|||estimates,|||guaranteeing|||smoothness|||of|||the|||solutions.|||The|||schemes|||are|||computationally TOKEN-backwarddifferencingformulas.Theschemesusenon-staggeredgridsandsatisfyregularityestimates,guaranteeingsmoothnessofthesolutions.Theschemesarecomputationally a b ba bac back y ly lly ally backwarddifferencingformulastheschemesusenonstaggeredgridsandsatisfyregularityestimatesguaranteeingsmoothnessofthesolutionstheschemesarecomputationally others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-backward a b ba bac back d rd ard ward backward others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others none none none none none none none none none none TOKEN-differencing a d di dif diff g ng ing cing differencing others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-are a a ar are are e re are are are others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others TOKEN-computationally a c co com comp y ly lly ally computationally others nonNum 0 no no no no no no others abstract
